thread.title: Trading in Samsung shares surges after stock split

title: Trading in Samsung shares surges after stock split
text:
Trading in Samsung shares surges after stock split 1:29pm BST - 01:21
Trading in Samsung Electronics shares surges after a 50:1 stock split aimed at making it easier for retail investors to buy into the South Korean technology giant. But as Ciara Lee reports, despite the high volumes, its share price dipped.
Trading in Samsung Electronics shares surges after a 50:1 stock split aimed at making it easier for retail investors to buy into the South Korean technology giant. But as Ciara Lee reports, despite the high volumes, its share price dipped. //reut.rs/2KCPqM2
